full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 755 Filed 08/10/22 Page 30 of 262 1735 LC8VMAX2 Gill Velez - direct 1 Q. Are personnel action notices kept in the ordinary course of business? 2 A. Yes. 3 Q. Ms. Gill, would you turn in the binder next to you to what's been marked for identification as Government Exhibit 823. Do you recognize it? 4 A. Yes. 5 Q. Have you reviewed this before today? 6 A. Yes. 7 Q. What is it? 8 A. This is a personnel action notice for Sky Roberts, when, it looks like, he was originally hired. 9 Q. Is this a fair and accurate copy of the version in Mar-a-Lago's records? 10 A. Yes. 11 MR. ROHRBACH: Your Honor, the government offers Government Exhibit 823. 12 MS. STERNHEIM: Objection. 13 THE COURT: For the reasons indicated, overruled. 14 And GX-823 is admitted. 15 (Government's Exhibit 823 received in evidence) 16 MR. ROHRBACH: Your Honor, may I publish it to the jury? 17 THE COURT: You may. 18 MR. ROHRBACH: I apologize, your Honor. We offer 19 SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00013308
